name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TestBuddy - Report & Fix Your Bug 20x Faster

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bug reporter with one-click record bug screen and share,integration with JIRA, ClickUp, and more tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to tedious bug reporting with TestBuddy, the fastest way to capture and share bugs.

Meet TestBuddy – reduce your bug reporting time by 20x and keep your focus on what truly matters! ⚡️ Reporting bugs can be a hassle, but TestBuddy makes it a breeze. 😉

With TestBuddy, you can create and send the perfect bug report in just one click. Forget long forms and confusing steps; simply record the bug in your browser and share it with an easy link. 🐛

TestBuddy seamlessly integrates with your favorite tools (Jira, ClickUp, GitHub, etc.) to ensure bugs are filed precisely where they need to be, as quickly as possible. 🚀
